mainPage.title: Ultrasound Diagnostics Uman
mainPage.subtitle: Accurate results, professional approach, comfortable conditions
mainPage.centerDescription: Our medical center specializes in performing ultrasound examinations using modern equipment. We strive to provide each patient with accurate diagnostics, comfortable conditions, and professional service.
mainPage.experiencedDoctors: Our team consists of experienced doctors who care about your comfort and the quality of examinations. We constantly improve to meet the highest standards of medical services.
mainPage.whyChooseUsDescription: We combine professionalism, modern equipment, and care for our patients — ensuring everyone receives a high-quality and comfortable examination.
mainPage.experiencedSpecialistsDescription: Our doctors have deep knowledge and extensive experience in conducting examinations.
mainPage.modernEquipmentDescription: We use the latest ultrasound machines for the most accurate diagnostics.
mainPage.wideRangeDescription: We offer ultrasound of all organs and systems — from general to specialized examinations.
mainPage.comfortableConditionsDescription: We create a pleasant atmosphere so that the procedure is calm and stress-free.

mainPage.servicesSoftTissuesDescription: Safe, painless examination of soft tissues.
mainPage.servicesHeartDescription: For children and adults — assessment of cardiovascular system.
mainPage.serviceslowerLimbVeinUltrasoundDescripti: Ultrasound examination of the veins of the lower limbs is a safe, painless, and highly informative diagnostic method.
mainPage.servicesLimbVesselsDescription: Examination of blood flow in veins and arteries of the limbs.

1.title: Soft Tissue Ultrasound
1.description: Ultrasound examination of soft tissues is a safe, painless, and highly informative diagnostic method that allows assessing the condition of muscles, tendons, fat tissue, lymph nodes, and other soft tissues of the body.

2.title: Heart Ultrasound. Echocardiography
2.description: Echocardiography is a non-invasive diagnostic method that provides detailed information about the structure and function of the heart. Using high-frequency sound waves, the doctor can assess heart size, wall thickness, valve mobility, large vessels, and blood flow.

3.title: Liver Elastography
3.description: Liver elastography is a modern ultrasound method that evaluates liver tissue stiffness. The stiffer the liver, the higher the degree of fibrosis, which may indicate cirrhosis or other liver diseases.

4.title: Liver Elastography + Abdominal Ultrasound
4.shortDescription: Liver elastography and abdominal organs ultrasound
4.description: Liver elastography and abdominal ultrasound are two powerful tools often used together for a comprehensive assessment of the liver and other abdominal organs.

5.title: Joint Ultrasound
5.description: Lower limb joint ultrasound is a procedure for diagnosing ankle, knee, and hip joints at any age. It helps detect joint, tendon, and ligament disorders and clarify previous diagnoses.

6.title: Lower Limb Vein Ultrasound
6.description: Ultrasound of lower limb veins is a safe and painless method that evaluates the venous system, identifies causes of swelling, pain, varicose veins, and other issues.

7.title: Lower Limb Artery Ultrasound
7.description: Ultrasound of lower limb arteries evaluates artery condition, blood flow velocity, narrowing, blockages, aneurysms, and other pathologies.

8.title: Lower Limb Vein and Artery Ultrasound
8.shortDescription: Ultrasound of veins and arteries in lower limbs
8.description: Ultrasound of lower limb veins and arteries is one of the most informative and safe methods for diagnosing vascular diseases of the legs.

9.title: Upper Limb Artery Ultrasound
9.description: Ultrasound of upper limb arteries allows assessment of blood vessels in the arms, detecting narrowing, blockages, aneurysms, and other pathologies.

10.title: Upper Limb Vein Ultrasound
10.description: Ultrasound of upper limb veins is a safe method for evaluating the venous system of the arms.

11.title: Upper Limb Artery and Vein Ultrasound
11.shortDescription: Ultrasound of upper limb arteries and veins
11.description: Ultrasound of upper limb arteries and veins is a non-invasive method to assess blood vessels and detect abnormalities.

12.title: Neck Vessel Ultrasound
12.description: Neck ultrasound is a safe method for evaluating soft tissues, lymph nodes, thyroid gland, salivary glands, and blood vessels.

13.title: Neck and Head Vessel Ultrasound
13.shortDescription: Ultrasound of neck and head vessels
13.description: Ultrasound of neck and head vessels allows evaluation of arteries and veins supplying the brain and detecting vascular pathologies.

14.title: Lymph Node Ultrasound
14.description: Ultrasound of lymph nodes helps assess the lymphatic system, detect enlargement, inflammation, or tumors.

15.title: Pelvic Ultrasound in Women
15.description: Pelvic ultrasound evaluates the uterus, ovaries, fallopian tubes, and other organs without surgical intervention.

16.title: Uterus and Ovary Ultrasound
16.shortDescription: Ultrasound of the uterus and ovaries
16.description: Ultrasound of the uterus and ovaries is a safe diagnostic method for female reproductive organs.

17.title: First Trimester Pregnancy Ultrasound
17.shortDescription: Ultrasound in the first trimester of pregnancy
17.description: First trimester ultrasound allows evaluation of early fetal development, confirms pregnancy, and detects possible pathologies.

18.title: Second Trimester Pregnancy Ultrasound
18.shortDescription: Ultrasound in the second trimester of pregnancy
18.description: Second trimester ultrasound assesses fetal development and pregnancy progress, typically performed between 18-22 weeks.

19.title: Third Trimester Pregnancy Ultrasound
19.shortDescription: Ultrasound in the third trimester of pregnancy
19.description: Third trimester ultrasound evaluates fetal development before birth and identifies potential complications.

20.title: Abdominal and Urinary System Ultrasound
20.shortDescription: Ultrasound of abdominal organs and urinary system
20.description: Evaluation of liver, gallbladder, kidneys, bladder, and prostate. One of the most common and informative diagnostic methods.

21.title: Abdominal Ultrasound
21.description: Includes liver, intrahepatic bile ducts, gallbladder, pancreas, and spleen.

22.title: Abdominal and Kidney Ultrasound
22.shortDescription: Ultrasound of abdominal organs and kidneys
22.description: Ultrasound evaluates organ size, shape, structure, detects pathological changes, and aids diagnosis or further examination.

23.title: Thyroid Ultrasound
23.description: Thyroid ultrasound is a safe and painless method that provides detailed imaging of the gland to detect early-stage diseases.

24.title: Scrotum (Testes) Ultrasound
24.description: Scrotal ultrasound is a safe method to assess testes, epididymis, and other scrotal structures, widely used in urology.

25.title: Urinary System Ultrasound. Kidneys, Bladder
25.description: Urinary system ultrasound is a safe and informative method to evaluate kidneys, ureters, and bladder.

26.title: Urinary System Ultrasound with Residual Urine Measurement
26.shortDescription: Ultrasound of urinary system with residual urine assessment
26.description: Ultrasound of kidneys, bladder, and prostate with residual urine measurement is a safe method to assess male urinary system health.

27.title: Breast Ultrasound
27.description: Breast ultrasound is a safe and painless method that provides detailed imaging of breast tissue and detects pathologies at early stages.

28.title: Breast Ultrasound + Elastography
28.description: Breast ultrasound with elastography is a modern diagnostic method that evaluates tissue stiffness and provides more detailed information than standard ultrasound.
